title: Mass Effect 3: Digital Deluxe Edition – v1.05.5427.124 + All DLCs
body:
Mass Effect 3: Digital Deluxe Edition – v1.05.5427.124 + All DLCs


Genres/Tags: Action, Shooter, RPG, Third-person, 3D, Pausable real-time
Companies: BioWare, Electronic Arts
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI8
Original Size: 25 GB
Repack Size: from 8.2 GB [Selective Download]

 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only] MULTi8
  • RuTor [magnet] MULTi5
  • Tapochek.net MULTi5
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2] MULTi8
  • Filehoster: Upera (Uploaded by Nice_2000, NOT compatible with other mirrors)
  • Filehoster: Google Drive (Uploaded by Uria Urikra, compatible with torrent)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on v1.05.5427.124 Origin release: 25 GB
  • RELOADED crack applied over
  • All single-player DLCs activated by default (you may need to press F12 once you’re on Normandya bridge; MP DLC bonuses can be activated by copying coalesced.bin file from _Unlocker folder to “BIOGame\CookedPCConsole”
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation (only when all languages and MP files installed)
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading and installing of French/Italian/German files and Multiplayer DLC files (needed if you want to activate MP weapons in SP mode or install some specific mods)
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 25 to 8.2~11 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes: ~35 minutes on 8-threads CPU; ~1 hour 10 minutes on 4-threads CPU
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 25 GB (28 GB during installation)
  • Language can be changed by running corresponding .reg-file in “_Language Changer” folder
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
  • ATTENTION! If you’re installing this repack under Windows 10, run setup with compatibility set to Windows 7

If you see PhysX Installer error at the end of the installation, just close the message and run ut manually from _Redist folder.

Game Description

Earth is burning. The Reapers have taken over and other civilizations are falling like dominoes. Lead the final fight to save humanity and take back Earth from these terrifying machines, Commander Shepard. You’ll need backup for these battles. Fortunately, the galaxy has a habit of sending unexpected species your way. Recruit team members and forge new alliances, but be prepared to say goodbye at any time as partners make the ultimate sacrifice. It’s time for Commander Shepard to fight for the fate of the human race and save the galaxy. No pressure, Commander.

Included DLCs

Single-player expansions

  • From Ashes
  • Leviathan
  • Omega
  • Citadel
  • Mass Effect 3 Extended Cut ending
  • N7 Collector’s Edition Pack – contains four new weapons, alternate outfits and a KEI-9 dog mech.
  • N7 Warfare Gear – contains N7 Valkyrie and M-55 Argus assault rifles, and N7 Defender Armour.
  • Firefight Pack – contains seven unique weapons for use in the single-player campaign.
  • Groundside Resistance Pack – contains seven unique weapons for use in the single-player campaign.
  • Alternate Appearance Pack – contains new outfits for Garrus, Liara, EDI and Shepard.
  • Mass Effect Genesis 2 digital comic

Multiplayer expansions (weapons/upgrades can be activated via special unlocker)

  • Resurgence Pack
  • Rebellion
  • Earth
  • Retaliation
  • Reckoning
